meanings.definition: The act of postponing a meeting or session to a later time.
meanings.sent1: The adjournments of the school assembly were always met with cheers from the students.
meanings.sent2: The judge announced the adjournments of the court hearing until the following week.
meanings.sent3: The adjournments of the dance practice left the dancers relieved for a break.
meanings.sent4: The adjournments of the soccer game felt like hitting pause on a thrilling match.
meanings.sent5: The adjournments of the movie night were a welcome chance to grab more popcorn.
